articles.title: Amyloid Plaques May Not Cause Alzheimer’s: New Research Challenges Decades-Old Theories - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A study shows that rising levels of brain protein Aβ42, not the reduction of amyloid plaques, better explains the cognitive benefits of new Alzheimer’s drugs. This finding challenges the traditional focus on plaques in Alzheimer’s treatment. A new study revea…
